channel.title: PI when i do a action (eat, drink, teleport or w.e) problem
channel.description:
Kinda confusing but, whenever i do something like teleport, eat, drink potions, or w.e.. it shows the animation. however most of the time you do these your hands become empty with no items but instead for me the items stay on your hands. here's what i mean!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3PvSbKZ8eaM

item.title: PI when i do a action (eat, drink, teleport or w.e) problem
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:2, topic:525497”]so you mean the items don’t disappear? lol

deleteItem(blah);

~^[/quote]

yes but, where do i add this? and i never had todo this hehe

Read full topic
item.source: PI when i do a action (eat, drink, teleport or w.e) problem
